PROJECT-1(2015 to 2017)

Title                : SESAME Application
Client              : CA-CIB Paris (Finance and Banking), Paris, Saint Quentin Yvelines
Team size        : 5
Technology      : Core Java
Database           :  SQL Server 2008
Operating System: Windows XP, Window 7, Unix
Frameworks:         Collections, Hibernate

Description:  SESAME is a Back-Office Java based application which is designed for generating and managing the paper Confirmations sent from the Back Offices such as SUMMIT, CIBOS/Calypso, Murex, Orchestrade, etc. to the different Counterparties. 
Sub-Applications: MESA, BSC, GEC

MESA: generates, validates and signs the Paper confirmations after it is being sent from the back offices to MESA via CFT/ MQSFT transfer methods.

BSC: Integration of confirmations into BSC application for managing and creating the events for the confirmations. It is sent to the Counterparties via MEF and ISSAC third party services.

GEC: The confirmations are archived and stored physically in GEC application.

Roles and Responsibilities

· Served as a Java Developer in SESAME application.
· Managed development, functional analysis and maintenance of each module within the application.
· Provided enhancement and e-mail support to the clients.
· Fixed minor and major bugs arrived in the application.
· Handled Releases comprising of application changes as per the issues/changes being requested by the client/Business users/Production users.


PROJECT-2(2016 to 2017)

Title                  : FX Structured (SESAME Application)
Client                : CA-CIB Paris (Finance and Banking), Paris, Saint Quentin Yvelines

Team size         : 3
Technology       : Core Java
Database          : SQL server
Operating System: Windows XP, Window 7, Unix
Frameworks:        Collections, Hibernate


Description:  FX Structured is a project based on developing a new Spring JMS Service which aims at receiving and consuming the trades being sent by the CIBOS Back office in our pre-defined Development Queue.
The main motive of creating a new service is to develop an efficient platform to resolve all the MQ Related issues and consumes all the trades at one go.
